channel.title: CIOs in your organisations
channel.description:
In DFID we have a new CIO (Chief Information Officer), Adrian Blundell.
Adrian worked on the precursor to IATI way back pre-2008 (anyone remember IDML?), along with Simon Parrish, but has been working in Zambia and in our HR/GroupOps teams since then.
Adrian would like to connect with people in similar CIO/CTO/CDO roles in other organisations, not just bilateral donors but also NGOs, foundations, private sector and multilateral.
Would you help by either posting a contact on the bottom of this thread, or by dropping me an email.
Thanks :slight_smile:

item.title: CIOs in your organisations
